edu.umd.cs.psl.model.kernel.predicateconstraint

Class DomainRangeConstraintKernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.model.kernel.AbstractKernel
      • edu.umd.cs.psl.model.kernel.predicateconstraint.DomainRangeConstraintKernel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtomEvent.Listener, ConstraintKernel, Kernel, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DomainRangeConstraintKernel
extends AbstractKernel
implements ConstraintKernel
    Produces GroundDomainRangeConstraints.

    Checks whether sets of Atoms of a binary StandardPredicate adhere to a DomainRangeConstraintType.

      • groundAll

        public void groundAll(AtomManager atomManager,
             GroundKernelStore gks)
        Description copied from interface: Kernel
        Adds all missing, potentially unsatisfied GroundKernels to a GroundKernelStore based on an AtomManager.

        Specifically, will add any GroundKernel templated by this Kernel that satisfies all the following conditions:

        • The GroundKernel has incompatibility or infeasibility greater than NumericUtilities.strictEpsilon for some assignment of truth values to the RandomVariableAtoms currently persisted in the AtomManager's Database given the truth values of the ObservedAtoms and assuming that any RandomVariableAtom not persisted has a truth value of 0.0.
        • The GroundKernel is not already in the GroundKernelStore.
        • If the Ground Kernel is a GroundCompatibilityKernel, its incompatibility is not constant with respect to the truth values of RandomVariableAtoms (including those not persisted in the AtomManager's Database).

        Only GroundKernels which satisfy these conditions should be added.

        Specified by:
        groundAll in interface Kernel
        Parameters:
        atomManager - AtomManager on which to base the grounding
        gks - store for new GroundKernels
        See Also:
        GroundCompatibilityKernel.getIncompatibility(), GroundConstraintKernel.getInfeasibility()

      • notifyAtomEvent

        protected void notifyAtomEvent(AtomEvent event,
                   GroundKernelStore gks)
        Description copied from class: AbstractKernel
        Handles an AtomEvent using the specified GroundKernelStore.

        Kernels need to have registered to handle this event with an AtomEventFramework.

        Specified by:
        notifyAtomEvent in class AbstractKernel
        Parameters:
        event - the AtomEvent that occurred
        gks - the GroundKernelStore to use

      • registerForAtomEvents

        public void registerForAtomEvents(AtomEventFramework manager)
        Description copied from class: AbstractKernel
        Registers with a specific AtomEventFramework to handle atom events.

        Subclasses are expected to register for the same AtomEvents and Predicates at all times. Kernels that do not fit this behavior should not extend this class.

        Specified by:
        registerForAtomEvents in class AbstractKernel
        Parameters:
        manager - The event framework to register with

      • unregisterForAtomEvents

        public void unregisterForAtomEvents(AtomEventFramework manager)
        Description copied from class: AbstractKernel
        Unregisters from a specific AtomEventFrameWork to no longer handle atom events.

        Subclasses are expected to have registered for the same AtomEvents and Predicates at all times. Kernels that do not fit this behavior should not extend this class.

        Specified by:
        unregisterForAtomEvents in class AbstractKernel
        Parameters:
        manager - The event framework to unregister from
